FpyHeartbeat.name: Heartbeat
FpyHeartbeat.help: When creating an FGO-py process in a complex environment, you may need to ping it every little while to prevent disconnections

FpyMain.name: Main
FpyMain.help:
Press the button and AP gauge emptied
Oh, it's now once button pressed, empty AP gauge forever

Serial.name: Serial
Serial.help:
Equivalent to `Connect to a device` dialog in FGO-py
You can find the Serial of common emulators in this option of the Alas body, and the rest is described in the `Connecting to Devices` section of the FGO-py readme.

LaunchPath.name: LaunchPath
LaunchPath.help:
The absolute path of the `AzurLaneAutoScript` subdirectory in the `deploy` directory of FGO-py
Please read the `Run with AzurLaneAutoScript` section of the FGO-py readme first.

_info.name: Interval
_info.help: Whenever a call to this task is completed, call it again after a certain period of time

Interval.name: Interval
Interval.help: HH:MM, HH cannot be omitted, MM can be greater than 60

Index.name: TeamIndex
Index.help: The position of the selected team in the team formation interface, left to right 1-10, 0 to disable

EatOnce.name: EatOnce
EatOnce.help:
After this task is called once, the `AppleCount` will be cleared to zero, and after that, just clears the AP gauge
If this option is turned off, then every time it is called, apples will be eaten

AppleTotal.name: AppleTotal
AppleTotal.help: When `EatOnce` is turned off, this value will automatically reduced to prevent eating non-existent apples

_info.name: Limit
_info.help: Disable this task when certain conditions met

KizunaReisou.name: KizunaReisou
KizunaReisou.help: Disable this task when bond essences earned

SpecialDrop.name: SpecialDrop
SpecialDrop.help:
Disable this task after several â˜…5 essences earned
This value is automatically reduced

_info.name: Benchmark
_info.help: Get the time cost for a single touch and screenshot

BenchOption.name: BenchOption
BenchOption.help: Able to be tested individually for touch or screenshots

_info.name: Call
_info.help: Calling some standalone widgets in FGO-py

Function.name: Function
Function.help: Name of the widget to be called
